participant_1.background:
I like musicians who are open about their sexuality and gender identity, because it gives me hope that I can be myself one day.
I go for long walks with my dog and explore new places.
i live in alabama.
I would not be able to be a pharmacist if I were blind because I would not be able to read the labels on the medication bottles.
i wear a red purse.

I get to be creative and have fun with my work.
I'm 5'8", but my dog is only 20 inches tall.
my favorite book is david copperfield.
I value my Louis Vuittons the most because they're a symbol of my success and status.

content.text: I'm glad you're a pharmacist! I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
What kind of things are you interested in?
I like to write, I like animals, and I like to explore new places.
I like writing too! What kinds of things do you like to write about?
I like to write short stories and poems. I'm also working on a novel, but it's a slow process.
That's cool! I've always wanted to write a novel, but I've never had the time.
I know what you mean. I'm lucky that I have a job that lets me be creative and have fun.
What do you do for work?
I'm a writer for a local magazine. I get to interview interesting people and write about their stories.
That sounds like a really cool job! I'm sure you meet some interesting people.
I do! It's one of the best parts of the job.
I'm glad you like your job. I love my job too. I get to work with animals all day long.
That's awesome! I love animals too. I have a dog and a cat.
I have a dog and a cat too! They're the best
